short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kairos enhances IIT Kharagpur's CDC portal by highlighting application deadlines and statuses with color-coded rows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kairos

Elevate your college career portal experience with Kairos, a sleek browser extension that brings clarity and efficiency to your job search. Kairos enhances your portal by adding intuitive visual cues to the list of companies:

ðŸ”´ Red Rows: Deadlines have passedâ€”quickly identify and move past expired opportunities.
With Kairos, you can effortlessly manage your applications, prioritize upcoming deadlines, and streamline your path to career success. Don't let opportunities slip away; let Kairos be your guide to making timely and informed decisions.
